short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to manage your rented items of unbound

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unbound Pass is a extension designed to provide access to Decentralized Applications (DApps) or Web3 enabled platforms utilizing rented assets from the Unbound platform.

This extension injects the Ethereum Web3 API into the JavaScript context of every website, thus facilitating direct blockchain and custodial wallet interactions managed by Unbound for Dapps.

Unbound Pass enables users to log in to their Unbound accounts and obtain a comprehensive overview of their rented Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs).

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, Unbound Pass requires the permission to read and write to any webpage.
